name: Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire
summary: Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire™ is the second expansion for the award-winning game, Guild Wars 2. As the balance of magic comes undone, lead your allies in the hunt for the rogue god Balthazar, whose scorched-earth campaign threatens the very existence of Tyria.
info:
• 中文名: 激战2：烈焰征途
  • 发行: 战火互娱
  • 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: MMORPG
  • 发行日期: 2017年9月22日
  • 售价: $29.99
  • 官方网站: https://www.guildwars2.com/en/path-of-fire/
